scripts.build: npm run build:check-env && parcel build public/index.html
scripts.dev:check-api: node -e "console.log('Detecting environment and testing API connectivity...'); const { getEnvironmentInfo } = require('./src/utils/environmentDetector'); console.log(getEnvironmentInfo()); process.env.API_BASE_URL = getEnvironmentInfo().type === 'development' ? 'http://localhost:3001/api' : '/api'; require('./scripts/testApiConnectivity.cjs');" || echo 'Warning: API may not be accessible. Check backend server.'
scripts.build:check-env: node -e "console.log('Validating environment configuration...'); const { getEnvironmentInfo } = require('./src/utils/environmentDetector'); const info = getEnvironmentInfo(); console.log('Build environment:', info); if (info.type === 'production' && !info.isVercel && info.isLocalhost) { console.warn('Warning: Building for production but detected localhost environment.'); } console.log('Environment validation complete.');"
